original_title: VVe Being Donna: The Light, the Dark
overview: "VVe Being Donna: The Light, The Dark," is a documentary that revolves around the life of Lt. Smt. Dr. Veerbala focusing on the painful moments and the happy ones.
tagline: Bad times also have a good, and good times also have an evil, Both pass away.
title: VVe Being Donna: The Light, the Dark
